alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Kane; Kendall; La Salle; Northern Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 1:17PM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wind driven snow expected through early evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, highest in the far southern Chicago metro and southern La Salle County. North winds gusting to 35 mph to briefly 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour will occur at times during the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
